import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Navbar, Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import {UserContext, Consumer} from '../Context/context'; import Logo from '../Pictures/bank.png'; function NavBar() { const [status, setStatus] = React.useState(''); return ( { value => (
  • Home
  • Create Account
  • Login
    • {value.LoginStatus}
  • {value.LoginStatus} Deposit
  • Withdraw
  • Balance
  • All Data
)} ) }; export default NavBar
